Class cPlanet

java.lang.Object
Data.cObjectBase
Data.cPlanet
public class cPlanet extends cObjectBase
Represents a planet with potential moons in the StarViewer application. This class extends cObjectBase to inherit naming functionality and manages a collection of moons orbiting the planet. It supports various planetary classifications based on composition and structure.

  • Constructor Details

    • cPlanet

      public cPlanet(String name, cPlanet.ePlanetType type)
      Constructs a planet with the specified name and type. Uses the standby logger as the default logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the planet
      type - the classification type of the planet

    • cPlanet

      public cPlanet(String name)
      Constructs a planet with the specified name and default type (Terrestrial). Uses the standby logger as the default logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the planet

    • cPlanet

      public cPlanet(String name, cPlanet.ePlanetType type, cLoggingBase logger)
      Constructs a planet with the specified name, type, and logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the planet
      type - the classification type of the planet
      logger - the logger to use for this planet

    • cPlanet

      public cPlanet(String name, cLoggingBase logger)
      Constructs a planet with the specified name, default type (Terrestrial), and logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the planet
      logger - the logger to use for this planet

  • Method Details

    • ClearMoons

      public void ClearMoons()
      Clears all moons from the planet. Also recursively clears all moons from each moon before removing them.

    • AddMoon

      public void AddMoon(cPlanet moon) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Appends a moon to the end of the planet's moon list. If the moon is already orbiting the planet, a warning is logged but no exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      moon - the moon to add to the planet
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the moon is null

    • AddMoon

      public void AddMoon(cPlanet moon, int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException, IllegalArgumentException
      Inserts a moon at a specific index in the planet's moon list. If the moon is already orbiting the planet, a warning is logged but no exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      moon - the moon to add to the planet
      index - the index at which to insert the moon
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds
      IllegalArgumentException - if the moon is null

    • RemoveMoon

      public void RemoveMoon(cPlanet moon) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes a moon from the planet by reference. If the moon is not orbiting the planet, a warning is logged but no exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      moon - the moon to remove from the planet
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the moon is null

    • RemoveMoon

      public void RemoveMoon(int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Removes a moon from the planet by index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the moon to remove
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds

    • GetMoon

      public cPlanet GetMoon(int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Gets a reference to a moon at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the moon to retrieve
      Returns:
      the moon at the specified index
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds

    • GetMoonCount

      public int GetMoonCount()
      Gets the number of moons orbiting the planet.
      Returns:
      the count of moons orbiting this planet

    • GetPlanetType

      public cPlanet.ePlanetType GetPlanetType()
      Gets the classification type of the planet.
      Returns:
      the planetary type of this planet

    • SetPlanetType

      public void SetPlanetType(cPlanet.ePlanetType type)
      Sets the classification type of the planet.
      Parameters:
      type - the new planetary type to set

    • ToString

      public String ToString(boolean recursive)
      Returns a string representation of the planet with optional recursive details.
      Parameters:
      recursive - if true, includes detailed information about all orbiting moons
      Returns:
      a string representation showing the planet name, type, moon count, and optionally detailed moon information

    • ToString

      public String ToString()
      Returns a string representation of the planet without recursive details.
      Overrides:
      ToString in class cObjectBase
      Returns:
      a basic string representation of the planet

    • GetRandomPlanetType

      public static cPlanet.ePlanetType GetRandomPlanetType(Random rand)
      Gets a random planetary type using the provided random number generator. This is a static utility method that can be used without creating a planet instance.
      Parameters:
      rand - the random number generator to use
      Returns:
      a randomly selected planetary type

    • GetRandomPlanetType

      public static cPlanet.ePlanetType GetRandomPlanetType()
      Gets a random planetary type using a new random number generator. This is a static utility method that can be used without creating a planet instance.
      Returns:
      a randomly selected planetary type
